website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas T-Mac Millennium is a hit in terms of both look and comfort. Players are more than excited when it was revealed that the model will be using the Adidas Boost technology. Several are also impressed with the shoe’s overall aesthetic. However, some think that the pair is quite pricey. Overall, if you’re looking for a reliable and responsive cushioning system, this model might be for you.
pros: It’s been the consensus that the Adidas T-MAC Millennium presents a great look for its users
Some further state that the pair can even pass as casual-use trainers
A player pointed out how comfortable these Adidas shoes for basketball are
Several patrons of the Adidas T-Mac collection are ecstatic to know that this basketball shoe model contains Boost, just like the 3rd volume of James Harden's signature basketball shoes
cons: A player says that the Adidas T-MAC Millennium belongs to an expensive price tier
Another player feels that the materials used in the shoe’s construction look cheap
A commenter shares that the heel lockdown of this Tracy McGrady shoe seems questionable

customer_reviews.title: Good For Playing Basketball
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Nike Hyperdunks. They are the best mass-produced basketball shoes ever made. Naturally, Nike stopped making them. Getting it right isn't entirely what capitalism is about. My first attempt at replacing them went poorly. The shoes (another model of Adida's) were quickly demoted to casual shoes. This model proved much better. I wore them around the house for a couple of months to promote the relationship between my foot and the shoe interior. The interior is spongy and seems to acclimate to the idiosyncrasies of the foot. They are not quite Hyperdunks, but they are worthy of the serious hoopster.
customer_reviews.author: Cooljerk

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT performing basketball shoes!
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoes. good basketball shoes. decent impact resistance, excellent traction on court, and excellent lockdown on your feet. if you are looking for good basketball shoes on decent price range, i strongly recommend these. my only complaint would be this is low ankle. I am used to high ankle basketball shoes so still trying to get used to my ankle being open, but other than that, (since it is my personal preferance to wear high ankle b-shoes) there really is no flaws or negative about the shoes. Hope this information helps
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazon+Adidas=Win💯
customer_reviews.text: Adidas TMac Millnium!! I really liked this shoe! I watched several video reviews of these shoes,saw the color I liked,and the price was a steal! Arrived as expected,but I do recommend going a half size down..other than that glad to have a pair👟
customer_reviews.author: SJC81

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for this item, decently satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit nice, comfortable, only problem is I question that they weren't purchased then sent back. Box was destroyed when I opened it and had a rubber band holding it together. Wont be sending the shoes back, look to be in good condition but if this is what I can expect from this company as far as quality and care goes I likely wont order more shoes from them. Not advertised as used shoes but I'm 95% sure these shoes were used then cleaned up before sending out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He has tried them for the first time. He has used other player shoes in the past. This is one of the best ones. Good grip, comfortable, good support.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe and excellent price!!! Thee most comfortable shoes ever!!!

customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at how comfortable these shoes are. I will shop with them again

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love Tmacs shoes each and ever one of them is nothing short of perfection. Fit feel comfort and they last

customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe, made with great material. Needs some break in time, but all good basketball shoes normally do.

customer_reviews.text: Adidas shoes run larger but size down half size and all is good. Hot pink is a little too bright but the price is too good to pass.
